Banner.title: Rent unlimited /Binance accounts/ to trade without limits

1.title: 1. Find owners
1.subTitle: Filter the marketplace to find the accounts that fit your needs

2.title: 2. Fund the escrow
2.subTitle: Send collateral funds to create a reserve in case your trade close in negative

3.title: 3. Trade in real-time
3.subTitle: Control rental accounts from one single connection. Via API or web.

4.title: 4. Collect Profit
4.subTitle: Your trade closed with profit? collect profit from the escrow and withdraw the reserve

WhyTradeSharing.title: Why TradeSharing?
WhyTradeSharing.subTitle: Portfolio liquidation is common today. Major exchanges create bots to track your positions, anticipate your movement and bet against you. How can you beat the big whales?

uncover.title: Uncover your position
uncover.subTitle: Avoid exchange to know your liquidation price

bypass.title: Bypass trading limits
bypass.subTitle: Avoid exchange restrictions to trade. Like caps on futures trading, and many others

decentralize.title: Decentralize your orders
decentralize.subTitle: Avoid exchange to track your history and predict your movements

lead.title: Lead new movement
lead.subTitle: Auto trade with unlimited accounts in real-time and lead market movements like never seen before
